about_the_game: Listen, if you're here reading this then you probably played Chroma Zero, and you know that the music is beautiful, expansive, intricate, emotive, and amazing in every way. This is ekorz, the developer typing here... the music is my favorite part of the game. I listen to this soundtrack all the time, away from the game, and it takes me back to Zero's universe in the best possible way. Treat yourself, and buy it. Also the composers are two amazing people who put an incredible amount of time, energy, and thought into the tracks. The soundtrack makes the game.
